description.english: Sustain a drift for at least 7 seconds

description.brazilian: Realize um drift de, no mínimo, 7 segundos

description.english: Complete a Smash-Up race, hitting only green signs
description.german: Schließe ein Smash-Up-Rennen ab, bei dem du nur grüne Schilder triffst
description.french: Terminez une course Smash-Up en ne percutant que les signes verts

description.spanish: Completa una carrera Smash-Up solo con señales verdes.

description.brazilian: Conclua uma corrida Smash-Up acertando só os sinais verdes

description.english: Obtain 3 stars in a Career event

description.brazilian: Ganhe 3 estrelas em um evento da Carreira

description.english: Complete any track with a total of 6 seconds flying
description.german: Schließe eine Strecke ab, bei der du insgesamt 6 Sekunden in der Luft bist

description.italian: Completa un qualsiasi tracciato totalizzando 6 secondi di volo
description.spanish: Completa cualquier circuito con un total de 6 segundos en el aire.
description.japanese: 好きなコースを合計6秒間飛行してクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua qualquer pista com 6 segundos de voo no total
